header:
<js>

    var ua = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/125.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/125.0.0.0";
    //在沒有新ua的時候用一個preset的隨機ua
    var headers = {
    	"User-Agent": ua,
    "Referer":"https://masiro.me"}; JSON.stringify(headers);

</js>

ruleSearch.author:
<js>
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
result=doc.select(".author").text().replace("作者: ","");
//java.log(result);
</js>
ruleSearch.name:
<js>
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
result=doc.select(".layui-card-header").attr("title");
//java.log(result);
</js>
ruleSearch.wordCount:
<js>
doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
result=doc.select(".words").text();
##字数: |字|共.+话|共话
n=parselnt(result);
a=n/10000;
result=a＋"万字";
//java.log(result);
</js>
##共话
